tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
After a long search for a good dentist, I feel really lucky to find Dr Anukriti. 
I find her extremely knowledgeable, kind, professional and considerate doctor.
Unlike other doctors who take shortcuts in their treatments, she tries every possible way to preserve your natural teeth and any kind of cosmetic or surgical treatment will be her last option.
She treated me patiently and very smoothly without much / any pain guiding me about the process throughout the treatment.
I also talked about my financial conditions with her and considering that she went ahead with the treatment.
She guided me properly about the daily oral routine, which I followed sincerely and found a major improvement in my oral health ( which she also noticed during my follow up).
So anyone who is tired of searching for a good dentist, I highly suggest you pay her a visit. I felt a difference( in a good way) consulting her, I hope you should too.
reply_text:
How generous of you to write in detail about the way you were treated at Dental Blush. 
Thank you for visiting us and trusting in us .

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:

Her treatment ways are very good
Highly recommend
reply_text:
Thank you for a wonderful response 
We appreciate such a positive feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My mom Sushila Tehlan was suffering from pain in mouth and allergy in mouth since last 4 years.We visited many doctors but no relief.Then somebody suggested Dr Anukirit. She listened to our problems patiently and checked all reports and suggested that my mom is allergic to all metallic items in mouth. My mom had a bridge in mouth of 6 teeth and 1 cap of metal which was causing pain and allergy.No other doctor could catch this but it is the expereince and intelligence of Dr Anukriti which found the issue. My mom is having no allergy in mouth as all bridge and caps are replaced to non metallic material which gave total relief to my mom.Without doing any unnecessary test Dr diagnosed and treated issue.We are glad that we visited Dr Anukriti at right time . She did all procedures painless. Her behaviour and concern for patient was outstanding. No doctor treats with such care.We would recommend Dr anukriti to everybody as she is the best.Thank u Doctor for treating my mom so nicely. Our family was in great tension due to mom's illness but sorted all.Thanks for being in our life!!! God bless u !!!
reply_text: It is a pleasure to bring a difference in your mums life. Every successful case is a blessing in itself. Thank you for such an honest feedback.

5stars

We look forward to seeing you at your next visit !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Cavities,Painful Teething,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Plaque,Dental Fillings,
review: I received exceptional care during my visits over the past month or so from Dr. Anukriti. I got several procedures done like scaling, dental fillings and she also suggested alternative treatment for RCT that is IPC which I really appreciate. She is very warm and welcoming and made me feel very comfortable. Her meticulous attention to detail and gentle hand made the experience pain-free. She took her time with the treatment and explained everything in detail. She guides you through the procedure which I really liked. I am glad I have found my go to dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Teeth Reshaping,Scaling / Polishing,Zirconia Crowns,Composite tooth filling,
review:
Since january 2020 my dental condition was worsening day by day.. Finally i did my research about a good dentist in rohini and arrived at Dental Blush. 
Dr clearly explained me in detail with every tooth in focus. I had a real bad situation that even i wasnt aware of entirely, plus i was never explained such in past by any other dentist. 
I went through multiple sittings of scaling , Composite fillings and few zirconia caps.. The entire treatment was completed in 2weeks. I am very happy with results. All thanx to Dr Anukriti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: pit and fissure treatment,re-root canal,Aesthetic Dentistry,Dental Fluorosis,Post and Core,
review:
I was visiting another dentist from last 10 years and got many treatment done in past .  One of my neighbour referred me to Dr Anukriti located here in sec 18 rohini. 
I was informed my past treatment were all not needed . They were unnecessarily done. All I required was Dental cleaning . So dr Anukriti did the same . And had to correct all the past treatment too. 
It's been 4months at Dr Anukriti, n I am quite satisfied with pain free experience. I feel confident in her hands . Totally trust her. 
*** ** *** **** ******* ** ****** *

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,
review:
I came here for RCT in my left molar and I am very happy with the result. All the doctors that I had consulted everyone had the same opinion that I should get my tooth removed/extracted but I didn't want that. So I came to Dr. Anukriti for second opinion , she explained me everything and told me that it can be saved as I am too young to loose an important tooth but we will have to treat it with utmost care and this procedure will take time. 
After 6 month of treatment , my tooth is in very good condition now and whole experience was very smooth and pain free. So I will recommend Dr. Anukriti 10/10.
